info.title: API Gateway DHL eCommerce
info.description:
Information on how to use the main endpoints in our gateway, can be found here: DHL developer API documentation

The stability and availability of API services can be monitored by visiting the API status page

get.description: Returns the list of PODs of the piece

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Piece id (parcel UUID)

parameters.name: receiver.address.postalCode
parameters.description: The postal code of the piece for which the POD is retrieved. Only necessary when accessing the POD endpoint without an API key

200.description: Piece PODs

pieceId.description: id of the piece to which the POD belongs to

mimetype.description: Mime type of the signature image

get.description: Returns piece information

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: One or more keys to search on, comma separated. A key has the following format: 'trackingKey+postalcode' or just 'trackingKey', where trackingKey must be a barcode, airwayBillNumber of shipmentNumber. When querying with a single trackingKey the API will return a reduced set of information for this piece (containing just the barcode, the list of events and any of the derived fields which can be populated based on the event data, such as the 'plannedDeliveryTimeframe' and 'deliveredAt' fields).

200.description: Pieces

contents.description: A description of the contents of this piece

declaredHeight.description: Piece height in cm, as declared by the shipper

declaredLength.description: Piece length in cm, as declared by the shipper

declaredVolume.description: Piece volume in l, as declared by the shipper

declaredWeight.description: Piece weight in kg, as declared by the shipper

declaredWidth.description: Piece width in cm, as declared by the shipper

deliveredAt.description: The moment the piece was delivered, in case it has been delivered. This information is derived from the events associated with this piece.

lines.description: The address as a list of strings. This field will only be filled when this address is related to an international shipment and no properly classified address data is available

code.description: Parcel shop code or terminal code (only present in case the type is 'PARCEL_SHOP' or 'TERMINAL')

name.description: Parcel shop name (only present in case the type is 'PARCEL_SHOP')

lines.description: The address as a list of strings. This field will only be filled when this address is related to an international shipment and no properly classified address data is available

deliveryCode.description: Known as 'kib kaart nummer' in SV-Depot

facility.description: The code of the facility where the event took place

height.description: Piece height in cm

length.description: Piece length in cm

localTimestamp.description: The time the event occurred in the local time of the event's locale

accountId.description: The account id of the customer (verladernummer in SVDepot, verzendernummer in Flow, payer account number in Genesis)

contents.description: A description of the contents of this shipment

declaredValue.description: The value of the shipment, declared by the shipper

declaredVolume.description: The volume, as declared by the shipper

declaredWeight.description: The weight, as declared by the shipper

destinationFacility.description: The code of the destination facility (GNSX), terminal (Flow) or depot (SV)

destinationServiceArea.description: The destination service area (will only be available for international shipments)

internationalReference.description: The international shipment reference, (SID reference in Genesis)

number.description: Shipment number, as known in FLOW

network.description: The network this Leg belongs to

originFacility.description: The code of the originating facility (GNSX), terminal (Flow) or depot (SV)

volume.description: The actual volume of the shipment

weight.description: The actual weight of the shipment

nextPlannedDeliveryTimeframe.description: The next alternative delivery timeframe, in the time interval format as specified by the ISO 8601 spec (i.e.: <start>/<end>, as in: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ/YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ)

plannedDeliveryTimeframe.description: The planned delivery timeframe, in the time interval format as specified by the ISO 8601 spec (i.e.: <start>/<end>, as in: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ/YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ)

serviceArea.description: The code of the service area where the event took place

signer.description: The name of the entity that signed for delivery

weight.description: Piece weight in kg

width.description: Piece width in cm

events.description: The list of events, sorted by date (ascending)

height.description: Piece height in cm

length.description: Piece length in cm

lines.description: The address as a list of strings. This field will only be filled when this address is related to an international shipment and no properly classified address data is available
The address as a list of strings. This field will only be filled when this address is related to an international shipment and no properly classified address data is available

code.description: Parcel shop code or terminal code (only present in case the type is 'PARCEL_SHOP' or 'TERMINAL')

name.description: Parcel shop name (only present in case the type is 'PARCEL_SHOP')

plannedDeliveryTimeframe.description: The planned delivery timeframe. This information is derived from the events associated with this piece.

lines.description: The address as a list of strings. This field will only be filled when this address is related to an international shipment and no properly classified address data is available

accountId.description: The shipper account number from Genesis

lines.description: The address as a list of strings. This field will only be filled when this address is related to an international shipment and no properly classified address data is available

shipperConfidential.description: Indicates if the shipper will be hidden or not

total.description: Total transitTime in days (sum of standard days, holiday days, remote area days and weekend days) based on shipment date and location

holiday.description: Extra transitTime for planned holidays based on shipment date and location

remoteArea.description: Extra transitTime for remote areas based on shipment date and location

standard.description: Standard transitTime for location based on shipment date and location

weekend.description: Extra transitTime for weekends based on shipment date and location

expectedDeliveryMoment.description: The expected delivery moment (in ISO-8601 format)

shipmentDate.description: The given shipment date (in ISO-8601 format)

volumetricWeight.description: The dimensional weight. The result of the following calculation: (length in cm * width in cm * height in cm / 5000)

weight.description: Piece weight in kg

width.description: Piece width in cm

podsAvailable.description: Indicates the types of pods present for the piece

get.description: This endpoint can be used to find the delivery and/or collection time frames. An overview of the available delivery/collection time frames is shown for a period of 14 days starting with the current day.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The country code of the postal code

parameters.name: postalCode
parameters.description: The postal code for the delivery and/or collection time frame

parameters.name: rules
parameters.description: The ruleset to use to filter the time windows. Possible values: default, c2c.

parameters.name: excludeDaysOfWeek
parameters.description: Days of week to exclude, expresses as an ISO 8601 weekday number (Monday = 1, Sunday = 7)

200.description: The time windows for the given postal code

400.description: A time window for the request could not be found.

get.summary: Retrieve the parcel types v2a for business users

parameters.name: fromCountry
parameters.description: The code for the origin country

parameters.name: toCountry
parameters.description: The code for the destination country

parameters.name: businessUnit
parameters.description: The business unit

parameters.name: fromPostalCode
parameters.description: The postal code for the sender country

parameters.name: toPostalCode
parameters.description: The postal code for the destination country

parameters.name: toBusiness
parameters.description: Indicates whether or not the destination is a business

parameters.name: returnProduct
parameters.description: Indicates whether or not the shipment is a return shipment

parameters.name: carrier
parameters.description: The carrier

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: Optional account number to filter result against the blacklist. Intersects with accounts from authorization token.

200.description: The parcel types for the given parameters

400.description: An invalid value has been provided a parameter

parameters.name: businessUnit
parameters.description: The business unit. Only used if auth token is absent.

parameters.name: fromCountry
parameters.description: The code for the origin country

parameters.name: toCountry
parameters.description: The code for the destination country

parameters.name: businessProduct
parameters.description: If true, only business products are returned, if false only non business products, otherwise all products

parameters.name: carrier
parameters.description: The carrier

200.description: The products

parameters.name: productKey
parameters.description: The key of the product

200.description: The product

parameters.name: fromCountry
parameters.description: The code for the origin country

parameters.name: businessUnit
parameters.description: The code of the business unit

parameters.name: carrier
parameters.description: The carrier

200.description: The destination countries for the given parameters

get.summary: Retrieve the destination countries with properties

parameters.name: fromCountry
parameters.description: The code for the origin country

parameters.name: businessUnit
parameters.description: The code of the business unit

parameters.name: carrier
parameters.description: The carrier

parameters.name: carrier
parameters.description: The carrier

parameters.name: fromCountry
parameters.description: The code of the origin country so service can return correct shipment options for this country.

parameters.name: businessUnit
parameters.description: The business unit

parameters.name: whitelistRequired
parameters.description: Limit to or exclude options that require whitelisting

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: Optional account numbers to filter result against the blacklist. Intersects with accounts from authorization token.

parameters.name: toBusiness
parameters.description: Indicates whether or not the receiver is a business

200.description: The shipment options for the given parameters

get.summary: Find the transit time for a country to a certain destination

parameters.name: fromCountry
parameters.description: The code for the origin country

parameters.name: toCountry
parameters.description: The code for the destination country

parameters.name: businessUnit
parameters.description: The business unit

parameters.name: toBusiness
parameters.description: Indicates whether or not the receiver is a business

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: The product for the transit times

parameters.name: parcelType
parameters.description: The parcel type

parameters.name: toPostalCode
parameters.description: The postal code of the receiver

parameters.name: toCity
parameters.description: The city of the receiver

parameters.name: returnProduct
parameters.description: Indicates whether or not the shipment is a return shipment

parameters.name: carrier
parameters.description: The carrier of the shipment

parameters.name: shipmentDate
parameters.description: Date when the shipment is sent

200.description: The transittimes for the given parameters

parameters.name: fromCountry
parameters.description: The code for the origin country, required when parcelType is given

parameters.name: toCountry
parameters.description: The code for the destination country, required when parcelType is given

parameters.name: toBusiness
parameters.description: Indicates whether or not the receiver is a business

parameters.name: returnProduct
parameters.description: Indicates whether or not the shipment is a return shipment

parameters.name: parcelType
parameters.description: The parcel type

parameters.name: option
parameters.description: The shipment options

parameters.name: fromPostalCode
parameters.description: The postal code of the sender

parameters.name: toPostalCode
parameters.description: The postal code of the receiver

parameters.name: toCity
parameters.description: The city of the receiver (only for express)

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: The account number

parameters.name: organisationId
parameters.description: The ID of the organisation

parameters.name: businessUnit
parameters.description: The code of the business unit

parameters.name: carrier
parameters.description: Related carrier for the capabilities

parameters.name: referenceTimeStamp
parameters.description: Date for determining the capabilities (only for express)

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: Quantity that will be supplied for the given parcel type

200.description: The capabilities for the given parameters

400.description: The needed parameters are missing or invalid parameters are provided.

post.summary: Obtain an access token / refresh token by providing a refresh token

200.description: The refresh token is valid. The token response contains the access token expiration and refresh token expiration as unix timestamp(seconds since seconds since Jan 01 1970).

401.description: Invalid or expired refresh token

post.summary: Obtain an access token / refresh token pair by authenticating with an API key

200.description: The provided api key is valid. The token response contains the access token expiration and refresh token expiration as unix timestamp(seconds since seconds since Jan 01 1970).

401.description: Invalid key

accountNumbers.description: OPTIONAL list of account numbers to restrict the access token to. Omit, leave null, or set empty to include all account numbers

post.summary: Retrieve a list of account numbers the provided API key grants access to

200.description: The provided api key is valid. The response body contains a JSON array of account numbers this api key grants access to.

401.description: Invalid key

accountNumbers.description: OPTIONAL list of account numbers to restrict the access token to. Omit, leave null, or set empty to include all account numbers

200.description: The requested drafts

remote.description: Boolean indicator whether this delivery area is located in a remote area

post.description: Promote all specified drafts to shipments and delete drafts. Drafts with errors cannot be promoted and will be marked as invalid

200.description: Draft promotion results for every draft matching the request

draftId.description: UUID of the draft, always set

groupIndex.description: Index of this draft in the current group

importId.description: Import UUID of the draft, only set when draft is requested by import UUID

importRowIndex.description: Row index of the import, only set when draft is requested by import UUID

shipment.description: Shipment result when type is PromoteDraftSuccess

shipmentTrackerCode.description: Optional tracking code for whole shipment

trackerCode.description: Tracking code for this piece in shipment

get.description: Find a  pickup requests by id

userId.description: Id of the user which requested the pickup.

timeCreated.description: Time pickup request was created. ISO8601 format.

accountId.description: Customer account id. Depending on country the account id might have a different format.

numberOfPackages.description: Number of packages requested to pickup.

numberOfPallets.description: Number of pallets requested to pickup.

isBusiness.description: Whether the address is a business address.
Whether the address is a business address.

confirmationNumber.description: Confirmation number. This is not a tracking number!

timestamp.description: Timestamp of pickup status event. ISO8601 format.

400.description: Invalid value for: path parameter id

get.description: Retrieve pickup requests for a user

limit.description: Limit of how many results are returned.

skip.description: How many results are skipped for pagination.

userId.description: Id of the user which requested the pickup.

timeCreated.description: Time pickup request was created. ISO8601 format.

accountId.description: Customer account id. Depending on country the account id might have a different format.

numberOfPackages.description: Number of packages requested to pickup.

numberOfPallets.description: Number of pallets requested to pickup.

isBusiness.description: Whether the address is a business address.
Whether the address is a business address.

confirmationNumber.description: Confirmation number. This is not a tracking number!

timestamp.description: Timestamp of pickup status event. ISO8601 format.

400.description: Invalid value for: query parameter limit, Invalid value for: query parameter skip

accountId.description: Customer account id. Depending on country the account id might have a different format.

numberOfPackages.description: Number of packages requested to pickup. Either this or numberOfPallets must be provided.

numberOfPallets.description: Number of pallets requested to pickup. Either this or numberOfPackages must be provided.

totalWeight.description: Optional total weight in kilograms of the packages to be picked up.

isBusiness.description: Whether the address is a business address.
Whether the address is a business address.

timeSlot.title: PickupTimeSlotDto
timeSlot.description: Time slot in which to pickup the package(s). (Only available with countryCode NL)

provideLabels.description: Whether the labels should be provided by DHL.

requesterName.description: Name of person who creates the pickup request. Required for sending an email on behalf of the requester to notify the shipper of the pickup.

organisationName.description: Name of the organisation that books the pickup. Required for sending an email on behalf of the requester.

userId.description: Id of the user which requested the pickup.

timeCreated.description: Time pickup request was created. ISO8601 format.

accountId.description: Customer account id. Depending on country the account id might have a different format.

numberOfPackages.description: Number of packages requested to pickup.

numberOfPallets.description: Number of pallets requested to pickup.

isBusiness.description: Whether the address is a business address.
Whether the address is a business address.

confirmationNumber.description: Confirmation number. This is not a tracking number!

timestamp.description: Timestamp of pickup status event. ISO8601 format.

403.description: Role to perform action is absent

post.description: Create customs documents and save as attachment

orderReference.description: Reference for your own administration, should match REFERENCE shipment option when creating shipment labels

accountId.description: Account id as provided by DHL

isBusiness.description: 'true' for a business address. 'false' for a consumer address

inboundVatNumber.description: Sender VAT number for inbound country. Only applicable for shipments to GB. Mandatory for Parcel Connect shipments to GB

isBusiness.description: 'true' for a business address. 'false' for a consumer address

product.description: Product key as provided by the capabilities endpoint, used for determining correct form type

isBusiness.description: 'true' for a business address. 'false' for a consumer address

currency.description: Currency of the invoice, ISO (EUR, CHF, NOK, GBP, USD)

remarks.description: Supplementary information, such as consignment remarks

customsGoods.description: Customs goods, at least one is required

code.description: HS-code of the goods, see Harmonized commodity description and coding System, to classify globally traded products. Always 8 or 10 positions.

origin.description: Country of origin, ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

quantity.description: Number of the products of this line

value.description: Total value of the goods of this line

weight.description: Net weight of the products of this line

incoTerms.description: DDX means 'DDP VAT Excl.' EXW not applicable for UK exports. For Parcel Connect only DDU applicable to UK.

value.description: Shipping fee value

defermentAccountDuties.description: Deferment Account for Duties (if a separate account exits for shipment to GB)

defermentAccountVat.description: Deferment Account for VAT (if a separate account exits for shipment to GB)

pieceCount.description: Number of pieces in the shipment

200.description: The created document attachment meta data

formType.title: FormType
formType.description: Type of customs form generated as attachment

401.description: No valid access token has been provided

403.description: Role to perform action is absent

409.description: Customs document with id already exists

post.description: Send the commercial invoice of a customs declaration to DHL for Europlus (B2B) and Parcel Connect (B2C) shipments. This is only applicable for customs destinations. It is also possible to send the customs documents T1, T2, EU-A, EU-Z using this endpoint.

incoterm.description: max 3 chars, International Commercial Term. Supported incoterms: CFR, CIF, CIP, CPT, DAP, DAT, DDP, DDU, DDX, EXW, FCA, FOB, DDX = 'DDP VAT Excl.' Ex-works not applicable for GB exports.

incotermCity.description: max 128 chars, named place of delivery/destination/port

invoiceDate.description: format YYYY-MM-DD, The date of the invoice

totalWeightKg.description: max 17,17 pos, Total weight in kg

freightCosts.description: max 19 pos, In case freight costs are separate on the invoice

invoiceLines.description: a list of commercial invoice lines

items.title: FlowInvoiceLineDto
items.description: A commercial invoice line for this commercial invoice

description.description: max 512 chars, Description of the goods

hsCode.description: 8 or 10 digits, HS-code of the goods, see Harmonized commodity description and coding System, to classify globally traded products. Always 8 or 10 positions

netWeightKg.description: max 17,17 pos, Total netto weight of the products of this line

numParts.description: max 10 pos, The number of the products of this line

countryOfOriginCode.description: 2 chars, ISO code for country of origin

value.description: max 19,2 pos, The total value of the goods of this line

amount.description: max 19,2 pos, The total value/price of the shipment

insuranceCosts.description: max 19 pos, In case insurance costs are separate on the invoice

otherCosts.description: max 19 pos, In case other costs are separate in the invoice. Can be negative (for discounts)

currency.description: 3 chars, Currency of the invoice, ISO (EUR, CHF, NOK, GBP, USD)

documentNumber.description: max 256 chars, The number of the document

phone.description: max 64 chars, Mandatory for shipments to GB

email.description: max 128 chars, Mandatory for shipments to GB

eoriCountryCode.description: 2 chars, First characters of the eori-number, indication the country-code.

eoriNumber.description: max 128 char, Next characters of the eori-number.

vatCountryCode.description: 2 chars, First characters of the VAT-number, indication the country-code. Mandatory for EuroPlus shipments to GB

vatNumber.description: max 128 char, Next characters of the VAT-number. Mandatory for EuroPlus shipments to GB

eoriCountryCode.description: 2 chars, First characters of the eori-number, indication the country-code.

eoriNumber.description: max 128 char, Next characters of the eori-number.

vatCountryCode.description: 2 chars, First characters of the VAT-number, indication the country-code

vatNumber.description: max 128 char, Next characters of the VAT-number

inboundVatCountryCode.description: 2 chars, First characters of the inbound country VAT number, indicating the country-code. Only applicable for shipments to GB. Mandatory for Parcel Connect shipments to GB

inboundVatNumber.description: max 128 char, Next characters of the inbound country VAT number. Only applicable for shipments to UK. Mandatory for Parcel Connect shipments to UK

defermentAccountDuties.description: max 64 chars, Deferment Account for Duties (if a separate account exits)

reasonForExportCode.description: max 2 chars, Supported Codes: 9 - Others, 11 - Sale of goods, 21 - Returned goods, 31 - Gift, 32 - Commercial sample, 91 - Documents. In case no code provided, default value will be 11.

items.title: FlowAttachmentDto
items.description: A document that supports the declaration, eg: invoice pdf, coversheet as pdf

content.description: max 2147483647 bytes; The invoice in pdf-format (base-64)

name.description: Name details, either personal name or company name is mandatory

parameters.description: Country code

parameters.description: The maximum number of results returned in the response

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude for searching around a location

parameters.description: Latitude for searching around a location

parameters.description: Radius in meters to search withing when searching around a latitude and longitude

parameters.description: Show parcel shops that are currently unavailable, e.g. due to holidays

parameters.description: Optional filter for type of service, parcel-first-mile or parcel-last-mile

parameters.name: isLocker
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether lockers should be returned or hidden

parameters.name: isBusinesspoint
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether businesspoints should be returned or hidden

parameters.name: excludeIfClosedWithin
parameters.description: Exclude locations that will be closed within X days from now, e.g. due to upcoming holidays

parameters.name: isPrintless
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether parcel shops supporting printless first mile parcels should be returned or hidden. When not provided, no filtering is applied.

parameters.description: Flag indicating evening delivery is possible
